meanings.definition: Lack of order or planning; randomness.
meanings.sent1: The haphazardness of the toys scattered around the room made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: The haphazardness of the traffic flow caused delays during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The haphazardness of the jumbled puzzle pieces made it impossible to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her haphazardness in packing her suitcase resulted in items spilling out during the trip.
meanings.sent5: The haphazardness of the scattered leaves created a colorful, chaotic carpet on the ground.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being haphazard.
meanings.sent1: We couldn't ignore the haphazardness of the mismatched furniture in the room.
meanings.sent2: The haphazardness of the painting's brush strokes gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent3: The haphazardness of the garden layout made it look like a whimsical wonderland.
meanings.sent4: His speech was full of haphazardness, jumping from topic to topic without a clear direction.
meanings.sent5: The haphazardness of the artist's style created a sense of spontaneity and freedom in the artwork.
